text: Syrian rebels announce fall of Russia-backed Assad regime  —  Syrian rebels announced on Dec. 8 that they had ousted President Bashar al-Assad from the capital city of Damascus.  —  “The tyrant Bashar al-Assad has fled.  We declare the city of Damascus free from the tyrant Bashar al-Assad,” rebel leaders said in a statement.

Syria rebels celebrate in captured Homs, set sights on Damascus  —  Syrian President Bashar al-Assad flew out of Damascus for an unknown destination on Sunday, two senior army officers told Reuters, as rebels said they had entered the capital with no sign of army deployments.
